analysis.description:
Reentrancy in VernamCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#351-403):
	External calls:
	- vernamCrowdsaleToken.mintToken(_participant,nextLevelTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#393-398)
	- vernamCrowdsaleToken.mintToken(_participant,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#398-399)
	External calls sending eth:
	- benecifiary.transfer(_weiAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#376)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- totalContributedWei (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#400-401)
	- totalSoldTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#399-400)

VernamCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#351-403) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-vernamCrowdsaleToken.mintToken(_participant,nextLevelTokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#393-398)
	-vernamCrowdsaleToken.mintToken(_participant,tokensAmount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#398-399)

VernamCrowdSale.releaseThreeHotHourTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#461-484) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-vernamCrowdsaleToken.mintToken(_participant,_amount) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#482-483)

Controller.releaseThreeHotHourTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#737-742) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-vernamCrowdSale.releaseThreeHotHourTokens(msg.sender) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#739-742)

Controller.convertTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#743-758) does not use the value returned by external calls:
	-vernamCrowdsaleToken.burn(_participant,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#756-757)
	-vernamToken.transfer(_participant,tokens) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#757)

Reentrancy in Controller.approveKYC (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#758-764):
	External calls:
	- vernamCrowdsaleToken.approveKYC(_participant) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#759-760)
	- isParticipantApproved[_participant] = vernamCrowdsaleToken.isKYCApproved(_participant) (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#760-761)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- isParticipantApproved (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#760-761)

VernamCrowdSale.buyTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#351-403) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- threeHotHoursEnd > block.timestamp (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#381-399)

VernamCrowdSale.calculateAndCreateTokens (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#407-452) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < thirdStageEnd (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#447-452)
	- block.timestamp < firstStageEnd (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#419-426)
	- block.timestamp < thirdStageEnd && weiAmount >= TEN_ETHERS (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#433-447)
	- block.timestamp < secondStageEnd (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#426-433)
	- block.timestamp < threeHotHoursEnd && totalSoldTokens < threeHotHoursTokensCap (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#411-419)

VernamCrowdSale.unlockTokensAmount (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#551-598) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- block.timestamp < firstMonthEnd && isTokensTaken[_participant][FIRST_MONTH] == false (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#557-561)
	- ((block.timestamp >= thirdMonthEnd) && (block.timestamp < fourthMonthEnd)) && isTokensTaken[_participant][FORTH_MONTH] == false (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#577-582)
	- ((block.timestamp >= fourthMonthEnd) && (block.timestamp < fifthMonthEnd)) && isTokensTaken[_participant][FIFTH_MONTH] == false (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#585-592)
	- ((block.timestamp >= firstMonthEnd) && (block.timestamp < secondMonthEnd)) && isTokensTaken[_participant][SECOND_MONTH] == false (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#563-568)
	- ((block.timestamp >= secondMonthEnd) && (block.timestamp < thirdMonthEnd)) && isTokensTaken[_participant][THIRD_MONTH] == false (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#570-575)
	- (block.timestamp >= fifthMonthEnd) && isTokensTaken[_participant][SIXTH_MONTH] == false (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#595-598)

VernamCrowdSale.getPrice (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#667-696) uses timestamp for comparisons
	Dangerous comparisons:
	- time < thirdStageEnd (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#694-696)
	- time < firstStageEnd (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#676-681)
	- time < secondStageEnd (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#681-688)
	- time < threeHotHoursEnd && totalSoldTokens < threeHotHoursTokensCap (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#672-676)
	- time < thirdStageEnd && weiAmount > TEN_ETHERS (/unique_chucks/18/0xbacc0ead4044508b6ebfb4eb06533d9512d303a3.sol#690-694)
